name: Figopoly
description:
This is a customized and fully playable version of Monopoly. This version is playable over Figma with no additional materials. Make your way around the board as you try to buy all of the most downloaded plugins! See Setup guide inside on how to get started. Summarized Monopoly rules are also included.


Plugins being used:

  1. Game Table
  2. Dice


Thanks to these awesome plugin developers for making game play this much smoother.


Let me know how your game goes, feedback is always welcome. Twitter @designerbrett
